title: Megadeth's Ellefson: Ghost's 'Square Hammer' Is The Best Song I Heard All Year [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 5 hours ago 14 
Megadeth bassist David Ellefson singled out Ghost's " Square Hammer " as the top song he heard in 2016. 
Asked on the whole matter by AXS , the musician briefly replied: "I would say probably not Megadeth. I would say Ghost, 'Square Hammer.'" 
"Square Hammer" was released on Ghost's 2016 EP "Popestar," peaking at No. 2 on the Mainstream Rock Songs chart. 
Back in September, one of the band's Nameless Ghouls explained why the tune was not included on the latest Ghost full-length effort " Meliora " despite being a smash hit. 
"It was conceived around the end of the conception of 'Meliora,'" he told Billboard. "I guess there was a moment there where it was like, 'Oh, shit, I have a new song,' but then, 'Forget it,' 'cause by then 'Meliora' had already been hammered out. 
"The conceptual aspect of it was already in place, and 'Square Hammer' felt like a different song. And also knowing that you don't have to blow your load every time. If you have something you can sit on it - sit on your load, man! So we basically saved it until a rainy day, and that rainy day came a few months later and we recorded it."In somewhat related stuff, UG community voted the "Hammer" as the No. 2 Best Song of 2016 .
